sourcesContent:
import React, {Component, useEffect} from "react"; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import axios from "axios"; export default class Mainpage extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {products: []}; } async componentDidMount() { await axios({ method: "get", url: 'http://localhost:3001/api/products', data: { name: this.state.name, price: this.state.price, } }).then(function (response) { console.log("Data: ", response.data); this.setState({name: response.data.name, price: response.data.price}); }).catch(function (error) { if (!error.response) { console.log("Check your connection") } console.log(error); }); }; addToCart = (product) => { this.props.addToCart(product); //må ha UI for å legge til i handlevogn }; static propTypes = { componentDidMount: PropTypes.func.isRequired, product: PropTypes.object.isRequired }; render() { return (
